steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"29vno","text":"The recipe produces enough medium to fill approximately 18 culture tubes.(12cm)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5242b","text":"First, add powder or solid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5q7jn","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"al8rs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":[100,100],"data":[["component","amount"],["streptomycin","0.175 g"],["Wesson's salt mixture ","0.625 g"],["yeast ","4 g"],["corn starch","4 g"],["casein","5 g"],["agar","15 g"],["sucrose","2.5 g"],["redbay sawdust","100 g"]],"guid":"86EC12C0DAA511ECBCE4870B3D4A449E","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["component","amount"],["streptomycin","0.175 g"],["Wesson's salt mixture ","0.625 g"],["yeast ","4 g"],["corn starch","4 g"],["casein","5 g"],["agar","15 g"],["sucrose","2.5 g"],["redbay sawdust","100 g"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}
